participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, loves to explore new ideas and colors.
participant_1.background: I'm not a fan of my singing voice, but I love to dye my hair different colors. I have a timeshare in Mexico. I do not have any children, but I love my family and Netflix. I love using my creative talents to make a difference in the world. I play music in my spare time.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and caring, dedicated to helping others and brings joy to those around him.
participant_2.background: I'm going to spend time with my family and friends. I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education. I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success. I draw comics. I like to dance with my friends.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Same, thanks for asking! I am a musician and I love to dye my hair different colors. I also have a timeshare in Mexico. What do you like to do in your free time?
I just graduated college with my bachelor's degree in education and I am excited to start my career as a teacher. I also enjoy drawing comics and dancing with my friends.
That's awesome! Congratulations on graduating college. What grade level are you going to teach? I love dancing too! I'm not very good, but I have a lot of fun.
Thank you! I'm going to teach kindergarten. I love little kids and I think it's going to be a lot of fun. I'm glad to hear that you like to dance. We should dance together sometime!
That would be awesome! I'd love to dance with you.
Great! We can exchange contact information and plan a time to get together.
Sounds good! I can't wait to meet you and dance with you.
